followersExceeded.message: Account followers limit exceeded. This limit is set for your account safety, but you can modify it in settings at your own risk.

followingExceeded.message: Account following limit exceeded. This limit is set for your account safety, but you can modify it in settings at your own risk.

followersAndFollowingExceeded.message: Account followers and following limit exceeded. This limit is set for your account safety, but you can modify it in settings at your own risk.

privateAccountMessage.message: This account is private. You need to follow this account to view their followers and following.

automaticDataRefreshTooltip.message: Automatically refresh data on app load after the specified interval

maxStoredUsersTootlip.message: Maximum amount of stored users. When limit is reached the oldest saved user gets overwritten

maxFetchCountTootlip.message: Maximum amount of followers or following that can be fetched. This limit is set for your account safety, but you can modify it in settings at your own risk.
